jparsec.vo

Class Siess

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.vo.Siess

  • public class Siess
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to access Siess et al. 2000 evolutionary tracks.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)

      • Siess

        Throws:

    • Method Detail

      • getStellarParametersFromSiessEvolutionaryTracks

        public static java.lang.String getStellarParametersFromSiessEvolutionaryTracks(double metallicity,
                                                               double effectiveTemperature,
                                                               double luminosity)
                                                                        throws JPARSECException
        Obtains stellar parameters of a pre-main sequence star using Siess evolutionary tracks.

        Output is a Siess record, that contains (in the first 12 elements) the following information separated by blank spaces:

        Spectral type.
        Luminosity in solar units.
        Radius in solar radii.
        Effective temperature in K.
        Mass in solar masses.
        Age in years.
        Bolometric magnitude.
        Bolometric correction.
        B-V color in Cousins system.
        V-R color in Cousins system.
        R-I color in Cousins system.
        V-I color in Cousins system.

        Adequate constants are defined in this class to access the fields of a Siess record. For more information visit L. Siess webpage at http://www-astro.ulb.ac.be/~siess/index.html.

        Parameters:
        metallicity - Metalliticy, from 0.01 to 0.04. 0.02 = solar metallicity.
        effectiveTemperature - Effective temperature in K.
        luminosity - Luminosity in solar units.
        Returns:
        Siess record, or empty string if the data cannot be found in the grid of Siess.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occur.

      • getModels

        public java.lang.String[] getModels()
        Returns the set of models.

      • getTrack

        public static CreateChart getTrack(double minMass,
                   double maxMass,
                   int phase,
                   int xField,
                   int yField,
                   int width,
                   int height)
                            throws JPARSECException
        Returns a chart with the evolutionary tracks. Metalicity is automatically set to 0.02.
        Parameters:
        minMass - Minimum mass for the tracks to be drawn.
        maxMass - Maximum mass.
        phase - Phase/s to be charted. Constants defined in this class.
        xField - X field to be charted. Constants defined in this class.
        yField - Y field to be charted. Constants defined in this class.
        width - Width of the chart.
        height - Height of the chart.
        Returns:
        The chart.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • getTrack

        public static CreateChart getTrack(double[] inputMasses,
                   int phase,
                   int xField,
                   int yField,
                   int width,
                   int height)
                            throws JPARSECException
        Returns a chart with the evolutionary tracks. Metalicity is automatically set to 0.02.
        Parameters:
        inputMasses - Set of masses for the tracks. Must be available to be shown.
        phase - Phase/s to be charted. Constants defined in this class.
        xField - X field to be charted. Constants defined in this class.
        yField - Y field to be charted. Constants defined in this class.
        width - Width of the chart.
        height - Height of the chart.
        Returns:
        The chart.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • addSeriesToTrack

        public static void addSeriesToTrack(CreateChart ch,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String[] x,
                    java.lang.String[] y,
                    double[] dx,
                    double[] dy)
                             throws JPARSECException
        Adds a new series to show points in the tracks.
        Parameters:
        ch - The tracks chart.
        name - The name of the new series.
        x - The x values.
        y - The y values.
        dx - The x errors.
        dy - The y errors.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • getClosestEvolutionaryTracks

        public static java.lang.String[] getClosestEvolutionaryTracks(double luminosity,
                                              double lumTolerance,
                                              double effectiveTemperature,
                                              double tempTolerance)
                                                       throws JPARSECException
        Returns all the evolutionary tracks close to certain values of luminosity and effective temperature, given also the maximum allowed change in both parameters.
        Parameters:
        luminosity - Luminosity in solar units.
        lumTolerance - Tolerance in luminosity.
        effectiveTemperature - Effective temperature in K.
        tempTolerance - Tolerance in effective temperature.
        Returns:
        The tracks as given by Siess models, or null if there is none.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

        A test program.
        Parameters:
        args - Unused.
